harmony-nodata: Unable to get {0} data. Either wait until next {1} update, or reconnect when element has been saved to disk
altitude-desc: The 'Altitude' element displays the player's current height (in meters) in relation to sea level.
armour-desc: The 'Armour' element displays the equipped armour's average durability (in %). If no armour is equipped, it is hidden.
bodyheat-desc: The 'Body Heat' element displays the player's current drop in body heat. If it is at normal body temperature (37°C / 98.6°F), this element is hidden.
compass-desc: The 'Compass' element displays the player's facing direction (in degrees) in relation to North.
compass-opt-tooltip:
Relative - Points to North
Absolute - Points to heading
date-desc: The 'Date' element displays the current date and an icon for the current season.
durability-desc: The 'Durability' element displays the selected item's remaining durability. If the item does not have durability, it is hidden.
latitude-desc: The 'Latitude' element displays the player's current latitude (in degrees).
light-desc: The 'Light' element displays the targeted block's light level. If no block is being targeted, it is hidden.
ping-desc: The 'Ping' element displays your current ping to the server.
players-desc: The 'Players' element displays the number of players currently online.
riftactivity-desc: The 'Rift Activity' element displays the time until next rift activity, and an icon for the current rift activity, varifying from calm to apocalyptic. Is hidden when rifts are disabled.
riftactivity-opt-tooltip:
True - Shows time till next rift activity change
False - Only show rift activity
room-desc: The 'Room' element displays a house icon when inside a room, a cabin icon when inside a small room (cellar), or a sun icon when inside a greenhouse. Otherwise, it is hidden.
sleep-desc: The 'Sleep' element displays a countdown until the next time the player is able to sleep. If the player can sleep, it is hidden.
speed-desc: The 'Speed' element displays the player's current speed (in m/s).
stability-desc: The 'Stability' element displays the temporal stability at the player's position if it is below 150%. Otherwise, it is hidden.
tempstorm-desc: The 'Temporal Storm' element displays a timer when a temporal storm is approaching or is in progress. Otherwise, it is hidden.
time-desc: The 'Time' element displays the current time and an icon for the position of the sun relative to the horizon.
timelocal-desc: The 'Time (Local)' element displays the system's local time.
weather-desc: The 'Weather' element displays the current temperature and an icon for the current condition.
weather-opt-tooltip:
C - Celsius
F - Fahrenheit
K - Kelvin
wet-desc: The 'Wetness' element displays how wet (in %) the player is. If the player is dry, it is hidden.
wind-desc: The 'Wind Speed' element displays the current wind speed (in %) at the player's position, and wind direction relative to the player.
